name: World's Toughest Game
description:
Following the footsteps of the great classic World's Hardest Game, in the World's Toughest Game, you are a red square and blue circles are your sworn enemies. Collect all the coins and get to the end of the level ! 

It is hard, very hard, and it will test your limits in terms of patience, skills and timing. If all goes accordingly to plan, you may also rage quit. Hell, I bet you can't even get past level 5. Get ready to be taunted and enjoy ! 

Controls : arrows keys / WASD to move around + spacebar to slow down time in easy mode. 

Check out www.forginbits.com for more :)
